meanings.definition: A person who specializes in optics.
meanings.sent1: The opticist helped me choose the perfect glasses for my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The opticist examined my eyes and prescribed new lenses.
meanings.sent3: The opticist made a spectacle of himself by wearing mismatched lenses.
meanings.sent4: Her keen eye for detail made her the opticist of the group.
meanings.sent5: The opticist's shop was filled with frames of all shapes and sizes.

meanings.sent3: The opticist solution enhanced the brightness of the light.
meanings.sent4: Her opticist skills allowed her to see clearly in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The opticist technology improved the quality of the camera lens.
